articles.author: Anand Krishnamoorthy
articles.title: Asian Traders Cautious as Data Void Clouds Outlook: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Global shares held a three-day gain that took them to within touching distance of a record high as the US House passed a bill to end the longest-ever government shutdown.
articles.content:
Global shares held a three-day gain that took them to within touching distance of a record high as the US House passed a bill to end the longest-ever government shutdown.
